p: For each segment alignment, a posterior distribution of trees was generated with BEAST v. 1.8.2 under a general time reversible substitution model with gamma distributed rate variation and a strict molecular clock [ 54]. We used a Yule birth-death speciation model tree prior [ 55]; all other priors were defaults. Trees were estimated using a Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC), and convergence was determined by visually inspecting the trace in Tracer v. 1.6.0 [ 56].
